tasks.name: Relocate auto map controls to equipment header with always-visible styling
tasks.description: Move auto map controls (threshold indicator, slider, and button) from device points header to equipment header, remove conditional rendering to make them always available, and style them sleekly like the bulk apply button for better contextual placement and improved user experience.
tasks.notes: This improvement provides better contextual placement since auto mapping affects the equipment list, not device points. Making controls always available improves workflow since auto mapping works regardless of device selection status.
